page.title: 03A CONTRACT FARMER IN BALNE
page.content: WE WENT TO INTERVIEW Mr. ASQUITH WHO IS A CONTRACT FARMER. A CONTRACT FARMER'S JOB IS TO DO A SERVICE FOR OTHER FARMERS USING HIS OWN MACHINERY ON THEIR LAND. IT IS A PROFITABLE JOB IF ENOUGH WORK IS AVAILABLE. Mr. ASQUITH BECAME INTERESTED IN CONTRACT FARMING WHEN HE WORKED FOR HIS FATHER. HE STILL ENJOYS IT BECAUSE THE WORK VARIES SO MUCH. THERE IS NO NEED TO ADVERTISE FOR WORK BECAUSE FARMERS TALK TO OTHER FARMERS ABOUT HIS EXPERTISE. THE MACHINES WHICH Mr. ASQUITH USES ARE TRACTORS, COMBINE_HARVESTERS, BALERS, GRASS_CUTTERS, HEDGE_CUTTERS, SUGAR_BEET HARVESTERS, BEET DRILLS AND MANURE_SPREADERS, BUT THE MOST VALUABLE OF ALL TO Mr. ASQUITH IS THE LARGEST TRACTOR.
